subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Connecticut center Hasheem Thabeet says he will return for his junior season instead of entering the N.B.A. draft. Thabeet, a 7-foot-3 native of Dar es Salaam, Tanzania, was projected as a first-round pick in the draft.
snippet: Connecticut center Hasheem Thabeet says he will return for his junior season instead of entering the N.B.A. draft. Thabeet, a 7-foot-3 native of Dar es Salaam, Tanzania, was projected as a first-round pick in the draft.
